content: materials double pointed needles in sizes 7 and 8 notes 1 tam is worked in the round on 2 different sizes of double pointed needles 2 lower edge of tam is worked in ribbing on smaller needles to create a stretchy fit 3 body of tam is worked in st st worked in rounds with larger needles and a stranded color work pattern lion brand pattern #l40074b alternate colorway #l40074
